WorkItem.Description: Geolocation auto-population of the search box via Google's API
WorkItem.Summary: Geolocation auto-population of the search box via Google's API (or another service?)

Comments.Message:
This requires Google Gears. I think a better approach might be to use a geolocation service like HostIP.com or IPInfoDB.com. http://ipinfodb.com might be better since they offer a JSON interface:
http://ipinfodb.com/ip_query.php?ip=131.107.0.82&output=json

If not, I've used HostIP server-side before and it worked really well.
